items.sentence: I\'m not going to take you back to Boston with me.
I get the feeling you don\'t really want me to go.
Tom had enough money to buy what he wanted to buy.
I\'m tired of listening to all of Tom\'s bragging.
It will cost me a lot to furnish my new apartment.
Do you actually think I\'d do something like that?
Tom went to Boston. Everyone else went to Chicago.
Tom told me that he\'d do that if I did that, too.
I\'d like to know why Tom isn\'t going to do that.
Everybody was listening intently to Tom\'s speech.
